
C2
Verses in the Book of Romans That Contain the Name Jehovah as Part of Direct or Indirect Quotations




VERSE

QUOTE OR REFERENCE

SUPPORTING REFERENCES



ROMANS 4:3

Genesis 15:6

J7, 8, 10, 17, 20, 22, 31-33, 37, 48, 65, 94, 95, 100, 101, 115, 125, 144, 146, 162, 163, 167, 236, 310, 322


ROMANS 4:8

Psalm 32:2

J7, 8, 10-12, 14-18, 20, 22-25, 31-36, 38, 40, 42, 43, 46, 52, 54, 57, 59, 61, 65-67, 88, 90, 94-96, 99-102, 105, 106, 108, 114, 115, 117, 118, 122, 130, 133, 136, 144-147, 162, 166, 187, 201, 203, 209, 210, 212, 213, 217, 228, 236-239, 244, 250, 267, 271, 273, 276, 279, 280, 287, 290, 295-297, 300, 306, 310, 322-324

Isaiah 10:23
